    • Method Detail

      • createGraphsFromFolder

        public java.lang.Boolean createGraphsFromFolder(java.lang.String folderName)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates several graphs from .graphml and .xml files in a specified folder. The .graphml files contain the node-edge structure while the .xml files hold the graph metadata.
        Parameters:
        folderName - of the folder containing the .xml and .graphml files
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getNodeChangeList

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<NodeChange>> getNodeChangeList()
        Returns:
        a list of NodeChange lists where each element is a list of NodeChanges between a two discrete versions.

      • createNodeChangeList

        public void createNodeChangeList()
        Command to create the list of NodeChange lists - one list is created for every version difference in list of graphs.

      • createAndPopulateNodeSummaryList

        public void createAndPopulateNodeSummaryList()
        Command to create a list of NodeSummaries where each NodeSummary contains a class' behaviour throughout it's entire lifespan.

      • getNodeSummary

        public NodeSummary getNodeSummary(java.lang.String gmlid)
        Returns a NodeSummary based on GMLid
        Parameters:
        gmlid - of NodeSummary to be retrieved
        Returns:
        NodeSummary whose GMLid matches @param

      • createAndPopulateEdgeSummaryList

        public void createAndPopulateEdgeSummaryList()
        Command to create the list of EdgeSummaries where each EdegSummary represents a the behaviour between two classes for their entire lifespan of their relationship.

      • getEdgeSummaryList

        public java.util.List<EdgeSummary> getEdgeSummaryList()
        Returns the list of EdgeSummaries
        Returns:
        the list of EdgeSummaries

      • getEdgeSummary

        public EdgeSummary getEdgeSummary(java.lang.String source,
                         java.lang.String target)
        Returns an EdegSummary where it is identified by the GMLids of the source and target nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - GMLid
        target - GMLid
        Returns:
        EdgeSummary whose source and target GMLids match those of the arguments

      • convertToJson

        public java.lang.Boolean convertToJson()
        Converts the graph structure and nested graph hierarchy to JSON files. NodeSummaries and EdgeSummaries are converted to their JSON representations.
        Returns:
        true is successful, false otherwise

      • getNodeSummaryList

        public java.util.List<NodeSummary> getNodeSummaryList()
        Returns the list of NodeSummaries.
        Returns:
        the list of NodeSummaries

      • createPackageStructure

        public void createPackageStructure()
        Command to create the nested class/package structure from each graph.
